title: RIOT I GOT BANNED!!!!
body:
Riot I got banned!!!!

And I deserved it. Good to see the new banning software is doing work. You guys have seriously done well with it! Won't flame so much next time at adcs I'm supporting (even if they can't adc).

See you in 2 weeks. ;D

Kind regards,

The Spawn Man, certified cleansed toxic. :P

replies.body: I really wasn't expecting this thread to be like how it is after reading the title. We all make mistakes so try not to be too hard on your ADC! :)
